results.title: Do not forgot passport
results.description: It was one fine early morning to changi airport to go back to yangon. Apperantely my passport was not with me when i reach airport . Because of this i spent additonal 50$ just to ask @bala with taxi. As a result i learned something that i am so forgetful and i need to come up with checklist which would remind me before i went out to oversea .

results.title: 20$ waste at Ice skating
results.description: It was waste of money when i bought public ice skating ticket for two without even checking the  shcedule. It was somehow not being careful on Fave T&C . A lesson learned from here is that next time read T&C carefullly before you even buy anything on fave .

results.title: Online ticket to Batam cause me 50$ more
results.description: Huge waste of money on batam ticket for three people as i bought from fave but no careful read on redemtion instruction. I was require to sent out traveller particulars to seller to get ticket.  When you buy something from fave always give time to read T&C and redemption instruction.

results.title: Pouring Jug
results.description: When I use the jug to pour the water to cook , the water leaked out onto the stove .next time when I use jug I need to make sure not to let the water leak out again .

results.title: Check before you use force
results.description: Today I made a big mistake . My faceshop bottle got cracked as I put it carelessly on the margin of my bed . Once I pulled out the bed , it rolled out and got cracked. As a result , iâ€™ve learnt that whenever i use force i am urged to check whether there are stuffs around it .
